title: Humanist sans serif font on Slice packaging?
content:
Please help me identify this font.  
Looks like Frutiger but has a different g.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022043457im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Slice_brochure_detail_3-1_5926.jpeg)

comments.content:
My mistake looks like Helvetica but has a different g.  
Any ideas?
